creator: UPTIVO
descriptionHtml:
Uptivo App helps fitness club members to track and store their workouts outside the club, and displays those sessions right beside the sessions at the club. Trainers are then able to review all members’ activities so they can help them improve performance, keep their weight under control, and enjoy a healthy and energetic lifestyle.

The app works with all chest and arm-based Uptivo heart rate sensors to provide accurate and engaging cardio frequency-based effort tracking and monitor individual training sessions. Real-time training monitoring makes workouts competitive and engaging and boosts members’ motivation while building a collaborative environment.

Monitor your workouts and training

The Uptivo app provides real-time information on your workout and training session so that you can conveniently adjust your effort to suit your training goals, such as tracking your actual heart rate, HR training zone split, duration, or calories burned.

Record and upload your training to the cloud

The Uptivo app automatically synchronizes each new training session with your Uptivo account to provide a complete overview of your progress with daily and weekly reports as well as an accurate and detailed analysis of all your workouts.

Go through your training journal

Take advantage of the Uptivo app to review past training session. Browse through the calendar, find the training you want to review, and review the duration and performance levels to use as benchmarks for your progress.

Assess your fitness level and progress

The Uptivo app features an easy to use Fitness Test to assess your current fitness level and get an immediate score based on recovery time. Run the test every 6-8 weeks to monitor your progress!

Update your profile

Your personal profile information is available online and can be accessed from any platform via a web browser or directly from the Uptivo app. You can review and edit your personal information, add a new picture to your profile, and update your bio-metric data.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Adds Club Rankings navigation and display in My Uptivo and in the Club sections
Adds a new Biometrics section to the main menu
Bug fixing

descriptionShort: Uptivo helps Fitness Club Members to Track their Workouts outside the Club.
title: Uptivo

creator: UPTIVO
descriptionHtml:
Uptivo App helps fitness club members track and store their workouts outside the club. Trainers are then able to review all members’ activities so they can help them improve performance, keep their weight under control, and enjoy a healthy and energetic lifestyle.

The app works with all chest and arm-based Uptivo heart rate sensors to provide accurate and engaging cardio frequency-based effort tracking and monitor individual training sessions. Real-time training monitoring makes workouts competitive and engaging and boosts members’ motivation while building a collaborative environment.

Monitor your workouts

The Uptivo app provides real-time information on your workout and training session so that you can conveniently adjust your effort to suit your training goals, such as tracking your actual heart rate, HR training zone split, duration, or calories burned.

Record and upload your training to the cloud

The Uptivo app automatically synchronizes each new training session with your Uptivo account to provide a complete overview of your progress with daily and weekly reports as well as an accurate and detailed analysis of all your workouts.

Club rankings

Are you a competitive individual? Take a look at your Club rankings for sessions, calories, Uptivo Performance Points, and more! Find your friends and see how they are doing month by month.

Club activities

You can browse through your Club activities to sign up or to get on the waiting list. Credits and subscriptions to attend to you Club activities can be purchased directly via the Uptivo app.

Integrations

The Uptivo app is available for Fitbit Ionic/Versa and for Apple Watch (watchOS 5 or greater). The Uptivo app receives heart rate data through Apple Health when using the Apple Watch.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

title: Uptivo

creator: UPTIVO
descriptionHtml:
Uptivo App helps fitness club members track and store their workouts outside the club. Trainers are then able to review all members’ activities so they can help them improve performance, keep their weight under control, and enjoy a healthy and energetic lifestyle.

The app works with all chest and arm-based Uptivo heart rate sensors to provide accurate and engaging cardio frequency-based effort tracking and monitor individual training sessions. Real-time training monitoring makes workouts competitive and engaging and boosts members’ motivation while building a collaborative environment.

Monitor your workouts

The Uptivo app provides real-time information on your workout and training session so that you can conveniently adjust your effort to suit your training goals, such as tracking your actual heart rate, HR training zone split, duration, or calories burned.

The Uptivo app automatically synchronizes each new training session with your Uptivo account to provide a complete overview of your progress with daily and weekly reports as well as an accurate and detailed analysis of all your workouts.

The Uptivo app automatically synchronizes each new training session with your Uptivo account to provide a complete overview of your progress with daily and weekly reports as well as an accurate and detailed analysis of all your workouts.

Club rankings

Are you a competitive individual? Take a look at your Club rankings for sessions, calories, Uptivo Performance Points, and more! Find your friends and see how they are doing month by month.

Club activities

You can browse through your Club activities to sign up or to get on the waiting list. Credits and subscriptions to attend to you Club activities can be purchased directly via the Uptivo app.

Integrations

The Uptivo app is available for Fitbit Ionic/Versa and for Apple Watch (watchOS 5 or greater). The Uptivo app receives heart rate data through Apple Health when using the Apple Watch.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Connect Uptivo to Garmin Connect from your profile settings to automatically import your smartwatch workouts into Uptivo.
Enable this option in your profile settings and automatically add the lessons you book to your phone calendar.
You can now use your Garmin HRM Dual with the Uptivo app.
Access all the new interactive Uptivo Workouts assigned to you by your gym from the Workout Programs menu.
Bug fixing.

title:
Uptivo
1.38.8.41

creator: Uptivo
descriptionHtml:
The UPTIVO APP is the ultimate fitness companion for those aiming to achieve their goals with the innovative Color Training technique. Its simple, intuitive interface displays heart rate zones in distinct colors, helping you maintain the ideal heart rate for each workout session.

The app is compatible with a wide range of Bluetooth heart rate monitors, including popular brands such as POLAR, GARMIN, MYZONE, DECATHLON, WAHOO, and many more.

Key Features:

- Workout Monitoring: Track and record your workouts with ease. The app offers real-time training monitoring, activity recording, and tools for booking classes and lessons at your fitness center. It also provides interactive training programs tailored by your personal trainer. Instructors can review members’ activities, offering guidance to boost performance, manage weight, and foster a healthy, active lifestyle.

- Rankings and Challenges: Love competition? Access your club’s leaderboard for stats on sessions, calories burned, and Uptivo Performance Points (UPPs). Track your friends’ progress month by month and participate in club challenges to earn exclusive digital badges for your profile.

- Training Plans: Access personalized workout plans created by your coaches, featuring exercise videos, weights, sets, and repetitions, allowing you to train effectively from home or the gym.

- Club Activities: Browse your club’s classes and lessons, sign up, or join a waiting list. You can purchase credits and subscriptions directly through the app to access these activities.

- Workout Sync and Analysis: The Uptivo app automatically syncs all your training sessions with your Uptivo account, giving you a complete overview of your progress. Receive daily and weekly reports with in-depth analysis of all your workouts.

Note: Some features require connection to an UPTIVO Club.
Warning: Continued use of GPS in the background may significantly reduce battery life.

Note: Some features require connection to an UPTIVO Club.
Warning: Continued use of GPS in the background may significantly reduce battery life.
